library("Rscience.GeneralLM")
# database <- mtcars
# var_name_factor <- "cyl"
# var_name_rv <- "mpg"
# alpha_value <- 0.05
my_dataset <- do.call(cbind.data.frame, params$"my_dataset")
var_name_rv <- params$"var_name_rv"
var_name_x01 <- params$"var_name_x01"
var_name_x02 <- params$"var_name_x02"
alpha_value <- as.numeric(as.character(params$"alpha_value"))

my_super_list <- Rscience.GeneralLM::GeneralLM_fix_dlreg_RCode(my_dataset = my_dataset,
                           var_name_rv = var_name_rv,
                           var_name_x01 = var_name_x01,
                           var_name_x02 = var_name_x02,
                           alpha_value = alpha_value)
